sqlGroup.name: sys
sqlGroup.sql: select mf.* from sys_function mf inner join sys_roleFunc rf on rf.func_id = mf.func_id where mf.func_type='module' and mf.state=1 and rf.role_id=? order by mf.order

select mf.func_id id,mf.func_name title,mf.func_css icon,mf.func_url href,true spread from sys_function mf inner join sys_roleFunc rf on rf.func_id = mf.func_id where mf.func_type='menu' and mf.state=1 and mf.p_id =? and rf.role_id=? order by mf.order
